main.name: Moctar Diallo
main.description: I build Deep Artificial Neural Networks well adapted to processing Big Data and make sense of it; applications are computer vision, speech recognition, natural language processing, audio recognition, social network filtering, machine translation, bioinformatics, drug design, medical image analysis, material inspection, board game programs, etc
main.bio: I am a Pythonist, AI lover, Data Scientist and Machine Learning/Deep Learning Developer. My favorite tools are Python, Tensorflow, Keras, Numpy, Pandas, Scickit-Learn, Opencv, and all the other available AI tools

education.description: Here i learned general engineering principles, the software engineering discipline, and programming languages like Java, Python and Lisp. Plus a thorough understanding of Algorithms design and implementations along with different comparisons of different paradigms of computations. A more pleased course i also followed is the Artificial Intelligence(6.034) course by Professor Patrick Winston

I learned C here and forgot it. I also learned C++ and forgot it. Then i learned CSS and also.. forgot it. I remeber using some terminal commands in linux, and... i forgot the rest. Oh yes, some SQL too! But i forgot it, and had to relearn it on youtube(or somewhere else.. i forgot it). Nevertheless the wonderfull environment helped me focus and follow my online courses and helped me get to be what i am now: a true-minded engineer.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
